summary: Comprehensive testing of Platform Super Admin Portal completed. All 11 features tested successfully. Backend APIs (16/16 tests passed) and Frontend UI (all pages loading and functional). Login, Dashboard with MRR/ARR metrics, Organizations management with plan change, Revenue & Billing, Platform Admins, Audit Logs with filters, and Settings with 5 tabs all working correctly.
passed_tests: Platform Super Admin Login - superadmin@platform.com / SuperAdmin@123 at /platform/login
Dashboard displays MRR (Monthly Revenue) metric
Dashboard displays ARR (Annual Revenue) metric
Dashboard displays New This Month metric
Dashboard displays Conversion Rate metric
Dashboard shows Organizations by Status breakdown (Trial, Active, Past Due, Suspended, Cancelled, Churned)
Dashboard shows Organizations by Plan breakdown (Trial, Starter, Professional, Enterprise with prices)
Dashboard has Quick Actions section with 4 navigation buttons
Organizations page lists all tenants with status/plan/usage columns
Organization detail modal opens with Subscription section
Plan change dropdown (data-testid='plan-select') works in modal
Plan change Update button (data-testid='change-plan-btn') successfully updates plan
Revenue & Billing page shows revenue breakdown by plan (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
Platform Admins page lists current admins with Add Admin button
Audit Logs page has action filter dropdown (All Actions, Create/Update/Suspend/Delete Organization, etc.)
Audit Logs page has entity type filter dropdown (Organization, Platform Admin, Platform Settings)
Settings page has General tab with Platform Identity and Maintenance Mode
Settings page has Signup & Trial tab with Allow Self-Signup and Email Verification toggles
Settings page has Email (SMTP) tab with SMTP configuration
Settings page has Billing tab with Razorpay configuration
Settings page has Integrations tab with Analytics and Error Tracking
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing organizations: Acme Corporation and Demo SaaS Tenant
context_for_next_testing_agent: Platform Super Admin Portal is fully functional. All pages accessible via sidebar: Dashboard, Organizations, Revenue & Billing, Platform Admins, Audit Logs, Settings. Key data-testids: platform-dashboard, platform-organizations, platform-billing, platform-admins, platform-audit-logs, platform-settings, plan-select, change-plan-btn, quick-action-orgs, quick-action-billing, quick-action-admins, quick-action-settings. Login stores platformToken and platformAdmin in localStorage.
